attributes.action: obligate professional indemnity insurance companies to reveal criteria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a small firm of solicitors have been kept in the dark about why we were unable to obtain PI cover from qualifying insurers. This cloak of secrecy is unacceptable, we have no idea whether we are being discriminated against justly or not. We requested the information but were refused as they stated that the companies are under no obligation to do so. Does this sound right to anyone?
